name: Field Rejects Report
query:
SELECT
    i.item_group AS "Item Group:Link/Item Group:160",
    sed.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:200",
    se.custom_farm AS "Farm:Link/Farm:100",
    sed.t_warehouse AS "Block:Link/Warehouse:100",
    UPPER(sed.custom_bay) AS "Bay:Data:60",
    SUM(sed.qty) AS "Rejected:Int:90",
    sed.custom_rejection_reason AS "Rejection Reason:Select:180"
    
FROM
    `tabStock Entry` se
JOIN
    `tabStock Entry Detail` sed ON sed.parent = se.name
JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON sed.item_code = i.item_code    
WHERE
    se.docstatus = 1
    AND se.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND se.custom_farm= %(farm)s
    AND se.stock_entry_type = "Field Rejects"
GROUP BY
    i.item_group, sed.item_code, se.custom_farm, sed.t_warehouse, sed.custom_bay, sed.custom_rejection_reason
ORDER BY
    i.item_group, sed.item_code, se.custom_farm, sed.t_warehouse, sed.custom_bay;

name: Harvest by Item Group
query:
SELECT
    -- se.posting_date AS "Date:Date:120",
    sed.t_warehouse AS "Block:Link/Warehouse:135",
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_group = 'David Austin' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "David Austin:Int:110",
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_group <> 'David Austin' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Others:Int:90",
    SUM(sed.qty) AS "Total Good Stems:Int:145"
FROM
    `tabStock Entry` se
JOIN
    `tabStock Entry Detail` sed ON sed.parent = se.name
JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON sed.item_code = i.item_code
WHERE
    se.docstatus = 1
    AND se.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND se.custom_farm = %(farm)s
    AND se.stock_entry_type IN ("Harvesting")
GROUP BY
    sed.t_warehouse
ORDER BY
    sed.t_warehouse;

name: Harvest Totals by Variety
query:
SELECT
    i.item_group AS "Item Group:Link/Item Group:160",
    sed.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:200",
    se.custom_farm AS "Farm:Link/Farm:100",
    SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Harvesting' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Good Stems:Int:108",
    SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Rejected:Int:100",
    SUM(sed.qty) AS "Total:Int:100",
    ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) / 
        SUM(sed.qty),1) AS "Rejection %%:Percent:110"
FROM
    `tabStock Entry` se
JOIN
    `tabStock Entry Detail` sed ON sed.parent = se.name
JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON sed.item_code = i.item_code
WHERE
    se.docstatus = 1
    AND se.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND se.custom_farm = %(farm)s
    AND se.stock_entry_type IN ("Field Rejects", "Harvesting")
GROUP BY
    i.item_group, sed.item_code, se.custom_farm
ORDER BY
    se.posting_date, i.item_group, sed.item_code, se.custom_farm;

name: Harvest Summary by Time of Day
query:
SELECT
    se.custom_farm AS "Farm:Data:90",
    i.item_group AS "Item Group:Link/Item Group:175",
    SUM(CASE WHEN HOUR(se.posting_time) < 13 THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "AM Qty:Int:100",
    SUM(CASE WHEN HOUR(se.posting_time) >= 13 THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "PM Qty:Int:100",
    SUM(sed.qty) AS "Total Good Stems:Int:135"
FROM
    `tabStock Entry` se
JOIN
    `tabStock Entry Detail` sed ON sed.parent = se.name
JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON sed.item_code = i.item_code
WHERE
    se.docstatus = 1
    AND se.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND se.custom_farm = %(farm)s
    AND se.stock_entry_type = "Harvesting"
GROUP BY
    se.custom_farm, i.item_group
ORDER BY
    se.custom_farm, i.item_group;

name: Harvest Pick Report
query:
SELECT
    i.item_group AS "Item Group:Link/Item Group:140",
    sed.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:200",
    se.custom_farm AS "Farm:Link/Farm:100",
    sed.t_warehouse AS "Block:Link/Warehouse:100",
    CASE 
        WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN sed.custom_bay 
        ELSE UPPER(se.custom_block__bed_number) END AS "Bay:Data:50",
    SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Harvesting' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Good Stems:Int:108",
    SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Rejected:Int:90",
    SUM(sed.qty) AS "Total Harvest:Int:120",
    ROUND(
        100 * SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) / 
        NULLIF(SUM(sed.qty), 0), 2
        ) AS "Rejection %%:Percent:110",
    sed.custom_rejection_reason AS "Rejection Reason:Select:180"
FROM
    `tabStock Entry` se
JOIN
    `tabStock Entry Detail` sed ON sed.parent = se.name
JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON sed.item_code = i.item_code
WHERE
    se.docstatus = 1
    AND se.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND se.custom_farm = %(farm)s
    AND se.stock_entry_type IN ("Field Rejects", "Harvesting")
GROUP BY
    i.item_group,
    sed.item_code, 
    se.custom_farm, 
    sed.t_warehouse, 
    CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN sed.custom_bay ELSE UPPER(se.custom_block__bed_number) END
ORDER BY
    i.item_group, sed.item_code, se.custom_farm, sed.t_warehouse;

name: Harvesting Stock Entries
Sales per Variety Report (SO)
query:
SELECT
    soi.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:200",
    SUM(soi.stock_qty) AS "Stems:Int:70",
    ROUND(SUM(soi.stock_qty) / total.total_stems * 100, 1) AS "Contribution:Percent:110",
   ROUND(SUM(soi.base_amount),2) AS "Amount (KES):Currency:130"
FROM
    `tabSales Order` so
JOIN
    `tabSales Order Item` soi ON so.name = soi.parent,
    (
        SELECT SUM(soi.stock_qty) AS total_stems
        FROM `tabSales Order` so
        JOIN `tabSales Order Item` soi ON so.name = soi.parent
        WHERE
            so.docstatus = 1
            AND so.transaction_date >= %(from_date)s
            AND so.transaction_date <= %(to_date)s
    ) AS total
WHERE
    so.docstatus = 1
    AND so.transaction_date >= %(from_date)s
    AND so.transaction_date <= %(to_date)s
GROUP BY
    soi.item_code
ORDER BY
    SUM(soi.stock_qty) DESC;

name: Sales Invoice Details
query:
SELECT
    si.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    si.name AS "Sales Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
    si.posting_date AS "Invoice Date:Date:120",
    sii.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
    sii.qty AS "Bunches:Float:80",
    sii.stock_qty AS "Stems:Float:80",
    sii.rate AS "Rate:Currency:100",
    sii.amount AS "Amount:Currency:120",
    si.currency AS "Currency:Link/Currency:80"
FROM
    `tabSales Invoice` si
JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON sii.parent = si.name
WHERE
    si.docstatus = 1
    AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
ORDER BY
    si.name, si.posting_date DESC, si.customer ASC, sii.item_code ASC;

name: Sales Order Report
query:
SELECT
    so.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:210",
    so.custom_statescountry AS "Country:Data:125",
    so.name AS "Sales Order ID:Link/Sales Order:150",
    so.workflow_state AS "SO Status:Data:95",
    so.transaction_date AS "SO Created:Date:115",
    so.delivery_date AS "SO Ship Date:Date:115",
    active_cpl.name AS "CPL ID:Link/Consolidated Pack List:150",
    active_cpl.workflow_state AS "CPL Status:Data:100",
    si_info.invoice_name AS "SINV ID:Link/Sales Invoice:160",
    si_info.status AS "SINV Status:Data:105",
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_group <> 'Herbs Qty' THEN soi.stock_qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Stems_SO Flwrs:Int:140",
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_group = 'Herbs Qty' THEN soi.stock_qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Stems_SO Herbs:Int:140",
    SUM(soi.stock_qty) AS "Stems_SO Total:Int:130",
    COALESCE(cpl_stems.total_stems, 0) AS "Stems_CPL:Int:100",
    COALESCE(si_info.total_stems, 0) AS "Stems_SINV:Int:110",
    COALESCE(cpl_stems.total_stems, 0) - SUM(COALESCE(soi.stock_qty, 0)) AS "Packing VAR:Int:110",
    so.base_total AS "Amt_SO:Currency:130",
    COALESCE(si_info.amount_pre_tax, 0) AS "Amt_SINV Pre.Tax:Currency:145"
FROM
    `tabSales Order` so
JOIN
    `tabSales Order Item` soi ON so.name = soi.parent
JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON soi.item_code = i.name
JOIN
    (
        SELECT
            t1.sales_order_id,
            t1.name,
            t1.workflow_state,
            t1.modified
        FROM
            (
                SELECT DISTINCT
                    dfi.sales_order_id,
                    cpl.name,
                    cpl.workflow_state,
                    cpl.modified,
                    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
                        PARTITION BY dfi.sales_order_id
                        ORDER BY 
                            CASE WHEN cpl.workflow_state != 'Cancelled' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
                            cpl.modified DESC
                    ) AS row_num
                FROM 
                    `tabConsolidated Pack List` cpl
                JOIN
                    `tabDispatch Form Item` dfi ON dfi.parent = cpl.name
            ) t1
        WHERE
            t1.row_num = 1
    ) active_cpl ON active_cpl.sales_order_id = so.name
JOIN
    (
        SELECT
            dfi.sales_order_id,
            dfi.parent AS cpl_id,
            SUM(dfi.custom_number_of_stems) AS total_stems
        FROM
            `tabDispatch Form Item` dfi
        GROUP BY
            dfi.sales_order_id, dfi.parent
    ) cpl_stems ON cpl_stems.sales_order_id = so.name AND cpl_stems.cpl_id = active_cpl.name
LEFT JOIN
    (
        SELECT
            si.name AS invoice_name,
            si.workflow_state AS status,
            SUM(sii.stock_qty) AS total_stems,
            si.custom_consolidated_packlist,
            si.base_net_total AS amount_pre_tax
        FROM
            `tabSales Invoice` si
        JOIN
            `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON si.name = sii.parent
        GROUP BY
            si.name, si.workflow_state, si.custom_consolidated_packlist
    ) si_info ON si_info.custom_consolidated_packlist = active_cpl.name
WHERE
    so.docstatus = 1
    AND so.transaction_date >= %(from_date)s
    AND so.transaction_date <= %(to_date)s
GROUP BY
    so.customer, so.custom_statescountry, so.name, active_cpl.name, active_cpl.workflow_state,
    si_info.invoice_name, si_info.status, cpl_stems.total_stems, si_info.total_stems, si_info.amount_pre_tax
ORDER BY
    so.customer, so.custom_statescountry, so.name;

name: Sales Invoiced Report
query:
SELECT
    si.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    c.territory AS "Country:Link/Territory:180",
    si.name AS "SINV ID:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
    si.workflow_state AS "SINV Status:Data:105",
    si.posting_date AS "SINV Date:Date:110",
    so_info.transaction_date AS "SO Created:Date:115",
    so_info.delivery_date AS "SO Ship Date:Date:115",
    si.custom_consolidated_packlist AS "CPL ID:Link/Consolidated Pack List:150",
    cpl.workflow_state AS "CPL Status:Data:100",
    so_info.name AS "Sales Order ID:Link/Sales Order:140",
    so_info.workflow_state AS "SO Status:Data:95",
    SUM(sii.qty * sii.conversion_factor) AS "Stems_SINV:Int:110",
    dfi_sum.total_stems AS "Stems_CPL:Int:105",
    so_info.order_stems AS "Stems_SO:Int:105",
    -- SUM(sii.qty * sii.conversion_factor) - dfi_sum.total_stems AS "Stems VAR_SINV-CPL:Int:125",
    si.base_net_total AS "SINV Amt Pre.Tax:Currency:150",
    si.base_total AS "SINV Amt Post.Tax:Currency:155",
    si.currency AS "SINV Currency:Data:125",
    si.selling_price_list AS "SINV Price List:Data:125"
FROM
    `tabSales Invoice` si
JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON sii.parent = si.name
JOIN
    `tabCustomer` c ON c.name = si.customer
JOIN
    `tabConsolidated Pack List` cpl ON si.custom_consolidated_packlist = cpl.name
JOIN
    (
        SELECT 
            parent,
            sales_order_id,
            SUM(custom_number_of_stems) AS total_stems
        FROM 
            `tabDispatch Form Item`
        GROUP BY 
            parent
    ) dfi_sum ON dfi_sum.parent = cpl.name
JOIN
    (
        SELECT
            name,
            workflow_state,
            transaction_date,
            delivery_date,
            custom_total_stock_qty AS order_stems
        FROM
            `tabSales Order` so
        GROUP BY
            name
    )  so_info ON so_info.name = dfi_sum.sales_order_id
WHERE
    si.workflow_state = %(workflow_state)s
    AND si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s
    AND si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
GROUP BY
    si.customer, c.territory, si.name
ORDER BY
    si.customer, c.territory, si.name;

name: Daily Sales Ops Summary
query:
SELECT
 so.name AS 'Sales Order ID',
 DATE(so.creation) AS 'SO Date',
 DATE_FORMAT(so.creation, '%H:%i') AS 'SO Time',
 so.customer AS 'Customer',
 wh.custom_farm AS 'Farm',
 soi.item_code AS 'Item Code',
 CASE WHEN soi.item_group = 'Herbs and Foliage' THEN 'Herbs' ELSE 'Roses' END AS 'Crop',
 IFNULL(packed_data.parent_fpl, 'No FPL') AS 'FPL ID',
 IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(packed_data.fpl_time, '%H:%i'), '00:00:00') AS 'FPL Time',
 IFNULL(ordered_data.Ordered, 0) AS 'Stems Ordered',
 IFNULL(packed_data.Packed, 0) AS 'Stems Packed',
 CASE WHEN ordered_data.Ordered = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 
    ROUND(packed_data.Packed / ordered_data.Ordered * 100, 2) END AS 'Fulfillment Rate'

FROM `tabSales Order` AS so
JOIN `tabSales Order Item` AS soi ON soi.parent = so.name
LEFT JOIN `tabWarehouse` wh ON wh.name = soi.warehouse

-- Aggregating Ordered stems by distinct variety
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT parent, warehouse, item_code, SUM(stock_qty) AS Ordered
  FROM `tabSales Order Item`
  GROUP BY parent, warehouse, item_code
) AS ordered_data
  ON ordered_data.item_code = soi.item_code AND ordered_data.parent = so.name AND ordered_data.warehouse = soi.warehouse

-- Aggregating Packed stems by distinct variety
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    sales_order_id AS parent_so,
    parent AS parent_fpl,
    fpl.creation AS 'fpl_time',
    source_warehouse,
    item_code,
    SUM(custom_number_of_stems) AS Packed
  FROM `tabDispatch Form Item` dfi
  JOIN `tabFarm Pack List` AS fpl
    ON fpl.name = dfi.parent
  WHERE fpl.docstatus = 1
  GROUP BY dfi.sales_order_id, dfi.parent, source_warehouse, dfi.item_code
) AS packed_data
  ON packed_data.parent_so = so.name AND packed_data.item_code = soi.item_code AND packed_data.source_warehouse = soi.warehouse

WHERE
    so.workflow_state = 'Approved'
    AND se.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY so.name, wh.custom_farm, soi.item_code
ORDER BY so.name, wh.custom_farm, soi.item_code;

name: Overall Discards and Rejects Report
query:
SELECT
    -- CONCAT("Wk ", WEEK(se.posting_date)) AS "Week #:Data:80",
    -- se.posting_date AS "Date:Date:110",
    CASE WHEN stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN tw.custom_farm ELSE sw.custom_farm END AS "Farm:Link/Farm:90",
    -- CASE WHEN stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN tw.parent_warehouse ELSE sw.parent_warehouse END AS "Parent Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:200",
    SUM(CASE WHEN stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Field Rejects:Int:110",
    SUM(CASE WHEN stock_entry_type = 'Discards-Ungraded' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Ungraded Discards:Int:155",
    SUM(CASE WHEN stock_entry_type = 'Discards-Graded' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Graded Discards:Int:140",
    SUM(CASE WHEN stock_entry_type = 'Graded Rejects' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Graded Rejects:Int:130",
    SUM(sed.qty) AS "Total:Int:95"
FROM
    `tabStock Entry` se
JOIN
    `tabStock Entry Detail` sed ON sed.parent = se.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabWarehouse` sw ON sed.s_warehouse = sw.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabWarehouse` tw ON sed.t_warehouse = tw.name
WHERE
    se.docstatus = 1
    AND se.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND se.stock_entry_type IN ("Field Rejects", "Discards-Ungraded", "Discards-Graded", "Graded Rejects")
GROUP BY
    CASE WHEN stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN tw.custom_farm ELSE sw.custom_farm END
ORDER BY
    CASE WHEN stock_entry_type = 'Field Rejects' THEN tw.custom_farm ELSE sw.custom_farm END;

name: Harvest Received Report
query:
SELECT
    tw.custom_farm AS "Farm:Link/Farm:90",
    se.custom_greenhouse AS "Block:Link/Warehouse:140",
    UPPER(se.custom_block__bed_number) AS "Bay:Data:60",
    i.item_group AS "Item Group:Link/Item Group:160",
    sed.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:200",
    SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Harvesting' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Good Stems:Int:108",
    SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Receiving' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Received:Int:90",
    SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Harvesting' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) - 
        SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Receiving' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Variance:Int:85"
    -- SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Receiving' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END)*100/
        -- SUM(CASE WHEN se.stock_entry_type = 'Harvesting' THEN sed.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Completion:Percent:90"
FROM
    `tabStock Entry` se
JOIN
    `tabStock Entry Detail` sed ON sed.parent = se.name
JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON sed.item_code = i.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabWarehouse` tw ON sed.t_warehouse = tw.name    
WHERE
    se.docstatus = 1
    AND se.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    AND tw.custom_farm = %(farm)s
    AND se.stock_entry_type IN ("Receiving", "Harvesting")
GROUP BY
    tw.custom_farm,
    se.custom_greenhouse, 
    UPPER(se.custom_block__bed_number),
    i.item_group,
    sed.item_code
ORDER BY 
    tw.custom_farm, 
    se.custom_greenhouse, 
    UPPER(se.custom_block__bed_number), 
    i.item_group, 
    sed.item_code;
